title: The World’s Strongest S-Class Adventurer, Known as the Thunder Emperor, Shows His Power Without Restraint and Becomes a Warrior in the Academy of Magic - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   School Life
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sword And Magic
author: Nurumayu   ぬるま湯
description:
There are beings who have been determined to be the strongest from birth.

His innate talent has reduced the efforts of those around him to nothing, and his hard-working genius is unrivaled.

He is an unidentified S-class adventurer wearing a mask. He is the youngest S-class adventurer in history, and his mastery of thunder magic is so impressive that his nickname is “Thunder Emperor”. He is known as the strongest magician in the world of adventurers.

His true identity is Noah Akright, a boy who lives in the forest with a witch.

Noah was picked up by the forest witch Shelah when he was a child.

Shelah noticed Noah’s extraordinary magical talent and gave Noah a gifted education in magic.

At the age of 15, he became the youngest ever to become an S-class adventurer.

With the alias “Van” and a mask of protective magic, Noah’s status as an adventurer was unassailable.

The day Noah became the youngest adventurer ever to be promoted to S-class adventurer, Sheila said to Noah, that he has another task.

”It’s your next assignment. The adventurer phase of hiding your identity and gaining power is over. Next, go to the magic academy and flaunt it to your heart’s content.”

Thus, in order to accomplish Shelah’s task, S-class adventurer Noah Akright, a.k.a. “Thunder Emperor” Van, is enrolled in the King’s Capital’s elite academy of magic – the Regulus School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Fortunately or unfortunately for the other magic academy students, ……

They can also lightly rebel against discrimination from the nobility, and they are also able to lightly rebel against pressure from senior students, and in the end, they can lightly crush the evil organization.

This is the story of Noah, the strongest sorcerer of the lightning system, demonstrating his power without regret and achieving various legends in the magic academy.

The strongest sorcerer who does not know how to add to or subtract from his power is a warrior with his overwhelming power.>
